1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Newsreader Naga Munchetty, singer-actor Jordan Stephens, actress Sally Lindsay and comedian David O'Doherty are the first four celebrity contestants competing against each other as the game show returns.

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: The four celebrity contestants compete against each other across a series of games presided over by amiable host Richard Osman. They will try to win one of the unique daily prizes and add to their score for the week.

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Richard Osman hosts the fun game show in which four celebrity guests compete over a series of games in an attempt to win one of the daily prizes and boost their score for the week.

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Breakfast television presenter Naga Munchetty, singer Jordan Stephens, actress Sally Lindsay and comedian David O'Doherty compete in the penultimate of this week's contests.

5.title: Episode #2.5

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: The week draws to a close but who will come out on top and be crowned the first weekly champion of the second series? Television presenter Naga Munchetty, singer Jordan Stephens, actress Sally Lindsay or comedian David O'Doherty?

6.title: Episode #2.6

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Comedians Ellie Taylor and Josh Widdicombe, actor and writer Steve Pemberton and television presenter Fern Britton are this week's celebrity contestants competing against each other in the entertaining game show.

7.title: Episode #2.7

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: The four celebrity contestants continue to compete over a series of games for the chance to win today's prize and boost their points tally for the week. Hosted by Richard Osman.

8.title: Episode #2.8

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Fern Britton, Steve Pemberton, Ellie Taylor and Josh Widdicombe continue to compete in weird and wonderful games set by Richard Osman.

9.title: Episode #2.9

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: This week's four celebrity contestants play more fun games. Will comedian Josh Widdicombe manage to avoid finishing in second place yet again?

10.title: Episode #2.10

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: The four celebrity contestants, Fern Britton, Steve Pemberton, Ellie Taylor and Josh Widdicombe, compete for the final time - who will be this week's champion?

11.title: Episode #2.11

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Four new celebrity contestants, actress Amanda Abbington, newsreader Michael Buerk and comedians Elis James and Shappi Khorsandi, face fiendishly fun games.

12.title: Episode #2.12

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: This week's four celebrity contestants compete across a range of quiz games in an attempt to win today's unique prize and add to their weekly score.

13.title: Episode #2.13

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: The celebrity contestants compete in games that will see them give their answer in alphabetical order, calculate the total of an answer and point to an answer on their tablet.

14.title: Episode #2.14

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: This week's four celebrity contestants near the end of their stint on the show. They compete against each other in a series of fun games set by host Richard Osman.

15.title: Episode #2.15

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: The four celebrity contestants compete for double points, a unique daily prize and to be crowned this week's champion.

16.title: Episode #2.16

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: Four new celebrities, actress Beattie Edmondson, comedian Hugh Dennis, television presenter Gaby Roslin and BBC Media Editor Amol Rajan, compete in the quiz.

17.title: Episode #2.17

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: Beattie Edmondson, Hugh Dennis, Gaby Roslin and Amol Rajan compete across a series of innovative quiz games to win a house of games branded prize and add to their weekly score.

18.title: Episode #2.18

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: This week's celebrity contestants compete in games such as Distinctly Average and It's All In The Name to win one of the unique daily prizes and add to their weekly score.

19.title: Episode #2.19

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: The celebrity contestants tackle games including The Answer's In The Question, Dim Sums and Z - A. Who will be today's winner and claim one of the House of Games branded prizes?

20.title: Episode #2.20

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: Which of the four famous faces will win today's daily prize and who will take advantage of double points Friday to be crowned this week's champion and lift the trophy?

21.title: Episode #2.21

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

21.plot: Actress Chizzy Akudolu, author and comedian Charlie Higson, historian Kate Williams and comedian Tom Allen are the celebrity contestants competing against each other in games such as Rhyme Time and Opposites Attract.

22.title: Episode #2.22

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

22.plot: This week's four celebrity contestants compete against each in a selection of games, including some old favourites such as Dim Sums, Broken Karaoke and Where Is Kazakhstan?

23.title: Episode #2.23

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

23.plot: The four contestants Chizzy Akudolu, Charlie Higson, Kate Williams and Tom Allen compete in games such as Mouse of Games and I'm Terrible At Dating.

24.title: Episode #2.24

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

24.plot: The four celebrity contestants continue to compete over a series of games such as You Complete Me and This Round Is In Code. Hosted by Richard Osman.

25.title: Episode #2.25

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

25.plot: Who will be crowned this week's champion and lift the trophy? Will it be actress Chizzy Akudolu, writer and comedian Charlie Higson, historian Kate Williams or comedian Tom Allen?

26.title: Episode #2.26

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

26.plot: Comedian Richard Herring, singer Jonathan 'J.B.' Gill, television presenter Katie Derham and Countdown (1982) arithmetician Rachel Riley are this week's celebrity contestants as the game show returns.

27.title: Episode #2.27

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

27.plot: Host Richard Osman selects more unusual games for this week's celebrity contestants, Rachel Riley, Jonathan 'J.B.' Gill, Katie Derham and Richard Herring to play.

28.title: Episode #2.28

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

28.plot: This week's four celebrity contestants continue to play more of the weird and wonderful games including Z-A and Where Is Kazakhstan?.

29.title: Episode #2.29

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

29.plot: This week's four celebrity contestants compete for a House of Games branded daily prize and points towards the weekly trophy in the entertaining game show.

30.title: Episode #2.30

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

30.plot: This week's four celebrity contestants battle it out for the final time and with double points on offer to determine who will win the final daily prize of the week and lift the weekly trophy.

31.title: Episode #2.31

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

31.plot: Comedian Lolly Adefope, journalist and presenter Dan Walker, presenter Sarah Greene and comedian Miles Jupp take on a series of challenging quiz games selected by Richard Osman.

32.title: Episode #2.32

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

32.plot: This week's four celebrity contestants continue to battle it out for points on the weekly leader-board and daily prizes in rounds such as highbrow lowbrow and broken karaoke.

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: The guests for the first week are Clara Amfo, Nish Kumar, Anneka Rice and Al Murray. They will compete in a series of eclectic rounds with all manner of questions.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Clara Amfo, Nish Kumar, Anneka Rice and Al Murray compete in random rounds that test their general knowledge. Hosted by Richard Osman.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: This week's four celebrity contestants continue to test themselves against the randomly selected range of weird and wonderful games in the hope of claiming today's prize and climbing the leader-board.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: The celebrity contestants compete in a series of games hoping to win a unique daily prize and position themselves on the leader-board ready for the final contest of the week.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: This week's competition draws to a conclusion as the four celebrity contestants battle it out one last time for the chance to win not just one of the unique daily prizes but to be this week's champion.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: The quartet of celebrity contestants competing in the second week are newsreader Clive Myrie, comedian Sara Pascoe and TV presenters Rick Edwards and Angela Scanlon.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: This week's four celebrity contestants compete against each other in a series of randomly selected games in the amiable game show hosted by Richard Osman.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Host Richard Osman tests the four celebrity contestants with a selection of weird and wonderful games. Today's winner will claim one of the unique daily prizes and improve their position on the leader-board.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: The tension in the House is ratcheted up a few notches as this week's contestants head into the penultimate round of games. Who will win today's prize and put themselves in pole position to win the trophy?

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: It's Friday, it's double-points and one of the four celebrity contestants will be walking away with one of the stylish daily prizes, but who will be crowned this week's champion?

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: TV presenters Anita Rani and Jamie Theakston, comedian Chris Ramsey and national treasure Janet Ellis are the four celebrity contestants in the final week of the competition.

12.title: Episode #1.12

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: The four celebrity contestants face another selection of random rounds containing all manner of weird and wonderful questions as they compete for the chance to claim one of the daily prizes.

13.title: Episode #1.13

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Janet Ellis, Chris Ramsey, Anita Rani and Jamie Theakston continue to do battle to enhance their position on the leader-board and to get their hands on one of the coveted daily prizes.

14.title: Episode #1.14

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: The action heats up and nerves fray as this week's competition enters its penultimate day. The four celebrity contestants will face five more rounds of weird and wonderful games.

15.title: Episode #1.15

episode of.title: Richard Osman's House of Games (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: Janet Ellis, Chris Ramsey, Anita Rani and Jamie Theakston do battle for the final time and with double points on offer the trophy could be won by any of them.

imdb.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
akas: Richard Osman's House of Games (United Kingdom)
plot: 'Richard Osman' (qv) hosts the game show in which he sets a panel of four celebrity contestants a series of games and puzzles to test their general knowledge.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>
